resources.string: Q. Do you get a refund after cancelling an order?
Q. How long does the refund process take after the cancellation of an order?
Q. How to login when you have forgotten the password?
A: Yes, you can cancel orders by calling the the delivery person whose number is provided as soon as the order is placed.
A: Yes, you will get a refund, but there will be some amount of cancellation charges applied to it.
A: It will take around 2 to 3 hours.

A: Click on the forgot password option in the login page. Then enter the email id or phone number that you had used to create the account. An OTP will be sent to the same and you can use that OTP to reset the account password.
NOTE : Please remember that an email will be sent and you can change your password by using the link
